text:
@RobertJenrick He took covid19 directly to a local hospital.

He put everyone there at risk.

He risked infecting his elderly parents.

The contempt conservatives are showing for the public is horrible. 

No apologies, no regret, no humility.

One rule for Cummings & Tories, another for plebs
